query:
SELECT 
  'crm_clients' as table_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM crm_clients
UNION ALL
SELECT 'deals', COUNT(*) FROM deals
UNION ALL
SELECT 'contacts', COUNT(*) FROM contacts
UNION ALL
SELECT 'client_tasks', COUNT(*) FROM client_tasks
UNION ALL
SELECT 'payment_collection', COUNT(*) FROM payment_collection
UNION ALL
SELECT 'website_projects', COUNT(*) FROM website_projects
UNION ALL
SELECT 'design_tasks', COUNT(*) FROM design_tasks
UNION ALL
SELECT 'leads', COUNT(*) FROM leads
ORDER BY count DESC;
